member.name: IAppxBundleManifestOptionalBundleInfo.GetFileName
member.summary: Retrieves the file-name attribute of the <OptionalBundle>.
member.param: A string that contains the file name of the package.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleManifestOptionalBundleInfo.GetPackageId
member.summary: Retrieves an object that represents the identity of the <OptionalBundle>.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleManifestOptionalBundleInfo.GetPackageInfoItems
member.summary: Retrieves optional packages in the bundle.
member.param: An enumerator over all payload packages in a <OptionalBundle> element of a bundle.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleManifestOptionalBundleInfo
member.summary: Provides a read-only object model for an <OptionalBundle> element in a bundle package manifest.
